title: I, the Weakest of the Four Heavenly Monarchs, Became the Master of Both the Hero and the Saintess - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manga   Antihero Protagonist   Arrogant Characters   Assassins   Calm Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Dead Protagonist   Demon Lord   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Fantasy World   Friends Become Enemies   Loli   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Multiple POV   Overpowered Protagonist   Tsundere   Underestimated Protagonist   Zombies
author: Nobeno Masayuki   延野正行
description:
DIE.

Capsodia the Death Scorpion (Level 1) was called the “weakest” and was chased out of his position as one of the Four Heavenly Kings in the Demon Lord’s Army.

He was planning to hide out in the Humans’ Territory until things died down a bit, but he became idolized by Pafimia, an animal-eared Hero, and Sharon, a pint-sized Priestess…

*The WN was discontinued for the LN.>
